Package za.ac.salt.pipt.common

Interface Summary
Link A link.
SpectrumOperator This interface applies to any class that modifies a spectrum.
 

Class Summary
DynamicReferences This class handles all the dynamic references between PiptData objects.
ErrorLog This class provides a simple error log shared by all PIPT tools.
Filter This class describes a filter.
Format This is a class of static methods for formatting numbers.
GenericSpectrum This class describes a generic spectrum.
Grid A base class for 1-D numeric grids.
GridResource A class to find and open a file resource for Grid data.
GridSpectrum This class provides an implementation of the abstract GenericSpectrum methods for a Grid based spectrum.
JohnsonFilter This class implements the Johnson UBVRI filters.
Mirrors This class constitutes a filter describing the SALT mirrors.
PiptDateTimeSpinner One of the ideas behind PIPT-related data is that it may be shared by applications.
 

Enum Summary
Phase An enumeration of the possible phases for a proposal.
